metadata.description: Scarlet Witch takes the stage in her own titular mini-series. After being plagued by horrifying nightmares, Wanda Maximoff seeks the mystical aid of mentor Agatha Harkness. Can Harkness unlock the inner sanctum of Wanda’s mind? And what hardships will Scarlet Witch endure when she discovers she is a ‘Nexus Being’?
metadata.name: Scarlet Witch
